GLOBAL.LB_DISPLAY_NAME: This is the name under which you will appear when sending emails. You can use your real name or a pseudonym to stay anonymous.
LAVABOOM.API.ERROR.DOWN: We are experiencing a server issue, please try again later.
NOTIFICATIONS.BACKUP_WARNING_TEXT: If you see this file just opens in your browser please select save as and save it to a safe location
NOTIFICATIONS.BAD_BROWSER_TEXT: Your browser might have problems with downloading, please consider using Chrome, Firefox, Opera or I.E >= 10
NOTIFICATIONS.MOBILE_BROWSER_TEXT: Our mobile platform is in the early alpha stage. Please let us know if you experience any bugs.
NOTIFICATIONS.NO_KEY_TEXT: You don't have a decrypted private key, please go to settings/security and import or decrypt one
NOTIFICATIONS.SERVED_BY_UNKNOWN_TEXT: We do not know which server served you Lavaboom. Please contact hello@lavaboom.com.
NOTIFICATIONS.WEB_CRYPTO_IS_NOT_AVAILABL: Looks like this browser is too slow for Lavaboom, please upgrade your browser or switch to an up-to-date version of Google Chrome, Firefox or Safari.
NOTIFICATIONS.WEB_WORKERS_IS_NOT_AVAILAB: Looks like this browser is too slow for Lavaboom, please upgrade your browser or switch to an up-to-date version of Google Chrome, Firefox or Safari
USER.LB_SIGNATURE_LN1: Sent with Lavaboom - your secure email provider.
USER.LB_SIGNATURE_LN2: Get your own address at lavaboom.com
VALIDATION.LB_USERNAME_PATTERN: Username can contain only a-z, 0-9 characters and optional dots(.) to separate parts
LAVALOGIN.AUTH.BTN_NO_ACCOUNT_YET: No Account Yet? Sign up Here!
LAVALOGIN.BACKUP_KEY.INFO1: We create and store your keychain locally in the cache of the browser you are using right now.
LAVALOGIN.BACKUP_KEY.INFO2: This means that if you want to access your Lavaboom account in a different browser or on a different machine you'll need to import your keychain at login into the new browser.
LAVALOGIN.BACKUP_KEY.INFO3: If you clear your cache from Lavaboom your keys will be deleted and you will lose access to your account.
LAVALOGIN.BACKUP_KEY.INFO4: To prevent this you should back up your keychain to your hard drive to keep it safe.
LAVALOGIN.BACKUP_KEY.INFO5: You can back up your keychain anytime in your Settings, or enable Lavaboom Sync to allow us to manage your keys for you.
LAVALOGIN.BACKUP_KEY.INFO6: Lavaboom Sync works basically backing up your keyring on our servers. Lavaboom Sync can work with or without a sync passphrase (similar to how Chrome works).
LAVALOGIN.BACKUP_KEY.TITLE: Back up your key
LAVALOGIN.CHOOSE_PASSWORD.LB_WARNING1: We recommend a long password, including numbers and special characters. Though it should still be easy for you to remember.
LAVALOGIN.CHOOSE_PASSWORD.LB_WARNING2: Please note that we will not be able to reset your password if you forget it. Only continue once you have memorised your password.
LAVALOGIN.CHOOSE_PASSWORD.TITLE: Choose your password
LAVALOGIN.CHOOSE_PASSWORD_INTRO.LB_WARNI: You are about to generate a new key pair for your account, but before this you need to select desired password
Please note that we do not store your passwords in plain text on our servers. This makes Lavaboom more secure, however if you lose your password we are unable reset it for you.
When you have chosen a password make sure to write it down on a piece of paper. Losing your password may prevent access to your account.
LAVALOGIN.CHOOSE_PASSWORD_INTRO.TITLE: Choose your password
LAVALOGIN.DETAILS.SUB_TITLE: We are legally obliged to ask you for this information. However, we do not use or verify this data.
LAVALOGIN.DETAILS.TITLE: Personal details
LAVALOGIN.GENERATE_KEYS.LB_WARNING1: Lavaboom encrypts your data client-side, on your computer. To do this we need to store an encryption key pair in your browser.
LAVALOGIN.GENERATE_KEYS.LB_WARNING2: This key is used to encrypt data. Share it with your friends so they can send encrypted messages to you.
LAVALOGIN.GENERATE_KEYS.LB_WARNING3: This key is used to decrypt data. Do not share it. Keep it safe and never share it with anyone.
LAVALOGIN.GENERATE_KEYS.TITLE: Key generation
LAVALOGIN.GENERATING_KEYS.LB_DO_NOT_CLOS: Please be patient, key generation may take few minutes...
Please do not close this window
Please be patient, key generation may take a while...
LAVALOGIN.GENERATING_KEYS.LB_ERROR: Cannot generate keys, make sure you are using an up-to-date version of Firefox, Google Chrome or Safari and try again.
LAVALOGIN.GENERATING_KEYS.LB_REACHED: Our hamsters are running extra hard, just a little longer to wait...
LAVALOGIN.IMPORT_KEY.LB_INFO1: We couldn't find your private key in the browser cache.
LAVALOGIN.IMPORT_KEY.LB_INFO2: This happens when you are using Lavaboom for the first time with this browser or if your browser cache has been cleared.
LAVALOGIN.IMPORT_KEY.LB_INFO3: Import the key you saved to your hard drive when you signed up with us and you're good to go.
LAVALOGIN.IMPORT_KEY.TITLE: Please Import Key to browser
LAVALOGIN.INVITE.BTN_I_HAVE_INVITE_CODE: Yes, I've got my invite code
LAVALOGIN.INVITE.TITLE: Have you got an invite already?
LAVALOGIN.PLAN.TITLE: Your Plan
LAVALOGIN.SECURED.LB_COMPLETE: We are currently in a closed beta and rolling out account invitations gradually. The email you will receive will tell you how long the wait time is.
LAVALOGIN.SECURED.LB_EMAIL_SENT: We have just sent an email to
LAVALOGIN.SECURED.TITLE: Nice one!
LAVALOGIN.SECURE_USERNAME.TITLE: Secure your Lavaboom username
LAVALOGIN.VERIFY_INVITE.LB_NEWS: Send me updates to my Lavaboom address.
LAVALOGIN.VERIFY_INVITE.LB_TOS: By signing up I agree that I've read and understood the
LAVALOGIN.VERIFY_INVITE.TITLE: Verify invite code

LAVAMAIL.CONTACTS.LB_NO_PRIVATE_KEY_FOUN: No decrypted private key found for this contact
LAVAMAIL.CONTACTS.PUBLIC_KEY_PROMPT1: We don't have the public key for this email address, so you can't send encrypted emails to it.
LAVAMAIL.CONTACTS.PUBLIC_KEY_PROMPT2: Would you like to ask for the public key and add it here manually?
LAVAMAIL.CONTACTS.LB_IMPORT_CONTACTS_DET: You can import your contacts from another email provider
LAVAMAIL.SETTINGS.GENERAL.LB_IMAGES_ALL_: It makes your browser directly download all external images, for both http and https protocols
LAVAMAIL.SETTINGS.GENERAL.LB_IMAGES_HTTP: It makes your browser directly download only https external images
LAVAMAIL.SETTINGS.GENERAL.LB_IMAGES_NONE: Block all external images, the most secure
LAVAMAIL.SETTINGS.GENERAL.LB_IMAGES_PROX: It makes your browser proxy all images through lavaboom secure proxy thus effectively hiding you behind the Lavaboom
